Summary: Trail of orange lights hovering and traveling diagonally then going away
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at the batting cages in Burtonsville,Maryland standing in the parking lot. I noticed the odd color of the lights and i thought it was a plane at first, But they were traveling in like groups of three and moving not like any plane i have ever seen. There was numerous amounts of the lights. They would disappear after awhile. When i first noticed them i thought they were meteors coming right at me. But then i saw them moving awkwardly and knew it was something totally out of the ordinary. I lost sight of it when i went inside the batting cages, They were gone when i came back to my car.
